node.title: Bridge collapses under floodwater, other drivers pulled to safety
node.alt: A collapsed bridge with a car in the river below
node.description: Major flooding in New South Wales has seen a bridge collapse, and elsewhere, people pulled to safety after their cars were swept from roads.
node.content:
["Major flooding in New South Wales has seen a bridge collapse, and elsewhere, people pulled to safety after their cars were swept from roads.", "In the state's central west, a driver escaped with their life after the Nyrang Creek Bridge, between Canowindra and Eugowra, collapsed due to flooding.", "Elsewhere, NSW police rescued four people from floodwaters.\u00a0", "A four-wheel-drive was swept 200 metres downstream\u00a0from a causeway\u00a0at\u00a0Burrell Creek, south-west of Taree, on the state's mid-north coast yesterday afternoon.", "Two men entered the rising floodwaters to try to help the trapped driver, a 65-year-old man, but also became stranded.", "Police threw a rope to the three men and pulled them to safety.", "In\u00a0Muswellbrook last night, a vehicle that had tried to cross a spillway was swept into floodwaters\u00a0and found 400m downstream.", "Police say the driver, a 52-year-old man, climbed\u00a0out of the ute but\u00a0began drifting downstream with the vehicle.", "Two police officers waded in to\u00a0help the man\u00a0and he was safely returned to shore.", "
Major flooding later today
", "The Bureau of Meteorology (BOM) is watching a number\u00a0of catchments across southern Queensland, New South Wales\u00a0and eastern Victoria.", "Senior meteorologist Sarah Scully said, in NSW, a\u00a0warning issued\u00a0for the Hunter River at Muswellbrook, Denman, Singleton, and Maitland has\u00a0been upgraded, with major flooding expected tonight.", "", "
The clean-up has begun in NSW's Upper Hunter, but there's a fresh\u00a0risk for downstream communities.(ABC News: Jake Lapham)
", "In the NSW central west, warnings have been issued for the Lachlan River with major flooding expected at Jemalong and moderate flooding at Namami and Condobolin.", "Major flooding is also expected at Mandagery Creek at Eugowra this afternoon, while moderate flooding is occurring along the Belubula River at Canowindra.", "With soils across most of eastern Australia near\u00a0saturation\u00a0and\u00a0dams at capacity,\u00a0any further rainfall risks exacerbating\u00a0already swollen rivers.", "
Flash flooding hits South-East\u00a0Queensland
", "The heaviest recorded rainfalls overnight were in South-East Queensland,\u00a0with a number of locations west of Brisbane receiving\u00a0more than 100mm.", "The Logan River at Rathdowney rose by\u00a010 metres from major flooding, while a major flood warning has been issued for the Logan River at\u00a0Beaudesert.", "In Queensland's South Burnett, a\u00a0swift water rescue crew launched a boat at Tingoora near Wondai\u00a0after\u00a0two cars became stuck in floodwaters.\u00a0", "Two people were rescued from each vehicle, and a dog was also retrieved. \u00a0", "In the Scenic Rim, Queensland Fire and Emergency Services brought in an excavator just before midnight to help get to two campers stuck in rising waters at Barney View.", "Heavy rainfall wasn't just confined to South-East Queensland, with 50-90mm\u00a0recorded along the\u00a0coast of New South Wales as well.", "
Warragamba Dam spills
", "Sydney's main water catchment, Warragamba Dam, is overflowing after reaching capacity about 9pm Friday.", "", "
Warragamba Dam is spilling at a peak rate of\u00a060-80\u00a0gigalitres per day.(ABC News)
", "\"Projections hold steady around at an estimated peak rate of 60-80\u00a0gigalitres per day,\" WaterNSW spokesperson Tony Webber said.", "\"We\u00a0expect some impacts in the river downstream.\"", "With another 5-10 millimetres expected to fall on Greater Sydney, there is potential for minor flooding on the Hawkesbury-Nepean Valley at\u00a0North Richmond and Colo.", "Residents are advised any flooding would be well below the flood levels experienced in March this year.", "Burrendong Dam received huge inflows on Friday which pushed storage capacity to almost fill the dam's 500GL flood mitigation zone.", "", "
Minor flooding on the lower Macquarie River at Dubbo and Wellington.(ABC Western Plains: Olivia Ralph)
", "Water released overnight caused minor flooding on the lower Macquarie River at Dubbo and Wellington on Saturday morning.", "Burrendong is one of the largest inland dams, holding enough water to fill Sydney Harbour three times.\u00a0", "
Residents inspect damage
", "", "
Scone resident Ernie Trew said the water rose from the his back fence into the garage within an hour.(ABC News: Jake Lapham)
", "The clean up in flood-affected Scone in the Upper Hunter is underway after major flooding hit the town on Friday, inundating properties.", "Resident Ernie Trew said the water rose from the his back fence into the garage within an hour, causing \"a few thousand dollars'' worth of\u00a0damage to work equipment.", "In the rush to move possessions to higher ground, his wife slipped on stairs and fractured her ankle.", "\"We had to get her into the lounge room, the paramedics fixed her leg in there for a while then \u2026\u00a0got her out on the stretcher,\" he said.", "\"[We] then passed her down the steps, loaded her into the dinghy and took her across to the ambulance.\"", "The NSW\u00a0SES is warning people to remain alert to changing conditions, with fresh\u00a0flood warnings now issued for several\u00a0communities.", "NSW SES spokesperson,\u00a0Adam Jones has asked people to remain vigilant after 17 flood rescues on Friday.", "\"Those 17 yesterday were too many but as a whole \u2026 we're really seeing a [positive] trend and we want to thank those [people].\""]
